name: NTP Monitor List Scanner
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
description:
This module identifies NTP servers which permit "monlist" queries and
        obtains the recent clients list. The monlist feature allows remote
        attackers to cause a denial of service (traffic amplification)
        via spoofed requests. The more clients there are in the list, the
        greater the amplification.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: RPORT
options.description: The target port

options.name: CPORT
options.description: The local client port

options.name: CHOST
options.description: The local client address

options.name: PCAPFILE
options.description: The name of the PCAP capture file to process

options.name: INTERFACE
options.description: The name of the interface

options.name: FILTER
options.description: The filter string for capturing traffic

options.name: SNAPLEN
options.description: The number of bytes to capture

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: The number of seconds to wait for new data

options.name: SECRET
options.description: A 32-bit cookie for probe requests.

options.name: GATEWAY_PROBE_HOST
options.description: Send a TTL=1 random UDP datagram to this host to discover the default gateway's MAC

options.name: GATEWAY_PROBE_PORT
options.description: The port on GATEWAY_PROBE_HOST to send a random UDP probe to (random if 0 or unset)

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: BATCHSIZE
options.description: The number of hosts to probe in each set

options.name: ScannerRecvInterval
options.description: The maximum numbers of sends before entering the processing loop

options.name: ScannerMaxResends
options.description: The maximum times to resend a packet when out of buffers

options.name: ScannerRecvQueueLimit
options.description: The maximum queue size before breaking out of the processing loop

options.name: ScannerRecvWindow
options.description: The number of seconds to wait post-scan to catch leftover replies

options.name: VERSION
options.description: Use this NTP version

options.name: IMPLEMENTATION
options.description: Use this NTP mode 7 implementation

options.name: SRCIP
options.description: Use this source IP

options.name: NUM_REQUESTS
options.description: Number of requests to send

options.name: RETRY
options.description: Number of tries to query the NTP server

options.name: SHOW_LIST
options.description: Show the recent clients list

options.name: StoreNTPClients
options.description: Store NTP clients as host records in the database
